channel.title: [525] [PkersParadise] [Bounty Hunter] [Corp] [Chaotics] [Economy]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]IMPORTANT: When you log in for the first time, it will crash your client. Restart your client and log in again and you should be good to go![/size]
Hey guys, PkersParadise is a 525 server that revolves around pking for the most part. We are currently still in beta testing and we are adding/updating every hour for the most part. Around this time was the best for pking for me especially and I loved to pk in bounty hunter. We would love to get help with testing and most of all you can just mess around on the server. Pictures are below and hop on because we are going to be giving stuff away so when the server reset happens when we go live we will give you special items that will put you ahead of the game.
Information: PK Points Shop PVP Bridding Chaotics Vesta Statius Full working magic Fully working bounty hunter Corp Spawning costs money Certain items arn't spawnable --- partyhats etc ::item (id) (#) ::sellitem (id) (#)
Note: while server is in beta you will be able to do commands that you wont in the release. Example :: food :: pots :: runegear :: ahrims free void and other items ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Also, I'm not claiming to be the best coder, just trying to have some fun so hop on :d ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [IMG]http://puu.sh/4aFAK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4aFIS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4aFLT.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4aFVe.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4aGgX.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Download link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/fvmi9x732thlbao/PkersParadise.rar]PkersParadise.rar[/url][/size]

item.title: [525] [PkersParadise] [Bounty Hunter] [Corp] [Chaotics] [Economy]
item.dc:creator: @g3t_brided_s g3t brided s
item.description:
@g3t_brided_s wrote:

[size=14pt]IMPORTANT: When you log in for the first time, it will crash your client. Restart your client and log in again and you should be good to go![/size]

Hey guys, PkersParadise is a 525 server that revolves around pking for the most part. We are currently still in beta testing and we are adding/updating every hour for the most part. Around this time was the best for pking for me especially and I loved to pk in bounty hunter. We would love to get help with testing and most of all you can just mess around on the server. Pictures are below and hop on because we are going to be giving stuff away so when the server reset happens when we go live we will give you special items that will put you ahead of the game.

Information:
PK Points Shop
PVP
Bridding
Chaotics
Vesta
Statius
Full working magic
Fully working bounty hunter
Corp
Spawning costs money
Certain items arn’t spawnable — partyhats etc
::item (id) (#)
::sellitem (id) (#)

Note: while server is in beta you will be able to do commands that you wont in the release.
Example
:: food
:: pots
:: runegear
:: ahrims
free void and other items

Also, I'm not claiming to be the best coder, just trying to have some fun so hop on :d





[size=14pt]Download link: PkersParadise.rar[/size]
